website_summaries.verdict: A simple hand grip that can hold a smartphone and GoPro camera at once.
pros: If you need to record two angles at once, this affordable grip does the job
Great for action shots and selfies
cons: Despite the name, this hand grip features no stabilization, mechanical or otherwise

customer_reviews.title: Instructions would have been Very useful
customer_reviews.text: First off great product, I have no argument with the product itself just it’s presentation. It came in (7) seven pierces without a single word on how to assemble the thing. It took me about 20 minutes with some trial and error. Just so maybe no one else will have this problem I’ve put together a group of photos during each step. Hopefully someone will find them helpful. Just be careful when you go to insert the screws it’s a little hard to see if you have the holes lined up properly if it doesn’t go in smoothly don’t force it. Good Luck
customer_reviews.author: E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with good grip
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Camkix stabilizing hand grip with dual mount. You can add your go pro and your phone and use it for both. The only issue i had was when the gopro is in the water proof case you can't fully tilt the camera back cause the case hits part of the mount. other than that it's great and you can't complain cause the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: chaddy

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday pole for the gopro
customer_reviews.text: This pole is a shocker. Sturdy, comfortable, small and great for everyday use. Much better than the gopro made poles. Has a nice textured rubber grip. 4 stars because the mount for the gopro did not tighten, making the camera flop back and forth. Company is going to send a replacement but I purchased a tripod mount from another vendor who also makes solid products. Hoping the replacement will work as its supposed to. But the pole, exceptional product which is used on a daily basis for travel. *update. Changed to 5 stars. Received a replacement mount and camera is now secure without any back or forward movements unless I position it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Solid grip at great price. Just don't expect too much actual "stabilizing."
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not sure how much "stabilizing" this handle does it certainly fits the bill for comfort and ease of use while shooting video. The handle is solid and well built, with a very nice rubber grip. That said, the joint and other accompanying parts feel like cheap-ish plastic. I worry about them breaking with extended use, but as of now, I'm very pleased. As mentioned previously, the unit is light on documentation, but it was simple enough to put together. Coupled with a wide-angle lens this will come in handy shooting realty home walkthroughs!
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of the best action camera grips i have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best action camera grips i have ever seen. Instead of looking through the small camera screen you can mount your Iphone seeing a larger picture of whatever you are videoing. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Works great to in order to hold both my screenless GoPro Hero Session along with my phone!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to in order to hold both my screenless GoPro Hero Session along with my phone! It allows me to have one handed control of both devices. If you are looking for a gimbal that provides you with smooth video this item is not for you but it does provide one handed control of both your devices and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice grip for a great price. Pros - fits gopro perfect - feels sturdy - grip is nice Cons - the hole where you screw on the gopro case to the actual stick is agives me difficulty to fit the screw into the hole sometimes and it feels like the threading of the screw may wear ou or loosen the hole that holds the case in place one day, but we'll see Other than the one slight con, no other gripes, i do not regret buying
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Stabilizer Grip
customer_reviews.text: I like the design that allows one to use a camera phone or a GoPro at the same time. I did change the camera/phone holder to a larger format to accommodate the Samsung Note 4 size with a cover. The included attachment only worked with the camera without the cover on the phone. and it was very snug with limited adjustment. Handgrip makes for better videos with less shaking movements.
customer_reviews.author: Deltadale

customer_reviews.title: Something new to try
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know the hand grip is good. My husband put it together. I didn't hear any complaints about the assembly. We have not used it yet as it was purchased for vacation, so I reserved one star until I see how useful it is. I'm sure I may not get to use it as the grandkids may take it over on vacation but either way we can give it a review then. The delivery was prompt and the grip looks to be as described.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: It's Awesome. Works just like it should. Made of sturdy materials and allows me to use my phone to record myself as I use my GoPro for filming in front of me. I would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Erice

customer_reviews.title: ... have been using it quite regularly and I am happy to report this product does not disappoint in being ...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and I have been using it quite regularly and I am happy to report this product does not disappoint in being sturdy, good quality and flexible. The grip on the phone is not flimsy at all and pairs very well with other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Budget Matters

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Came when I expected. Was easy to assemble. Used it to film my first iPhone 7 movie. Got good shots holding it arms length away. Watched some YouTubes on tips. Got good feedback on the movie. Shot footage for like an hour all different conditions. I like the arm handle I felt safer holding my iPhone. Very tight latch and grip with my phone! Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Louise

customer_reviews.title: This feels very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I don't know why people refer to this item as a stabilizer clearly is not. It feels very plastic and light to handle it, It would be nice to have something more solid and wheight to it. I don't know why they feature a plastic bag and a nob in the description. But u get what u pay for. This is all made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: mario garcia

customer_reviews.title: The handle and grip on this grip feels very comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: The handle and grip on this grip feels very comfortable and secure. I used it when I went to Coachella where poles and extender grips aren't allowed. At night when a GoPro's video quality isn't as good, I attached the phone grip to use with my Samsung S7 smartphone! Awesome grip!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This handgrip far exceeded my expectations. It’s exactly what I was looking for and in my opinion well-made. GoPro 5 Mounted on the front away fro me, iPhone X mounted on the back facing me acting as the control point and monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Saint John

customer_reviews.title: This is the handle you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This handle is super sturdy and doesn’t transfer noise to my GoPro. Rubberized grip is excellent and the lanyard is there for backup. Wish I had found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a simple product that does exactly what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple product that does exactly what it's supposed to: it allows me to view (and control) with my iPhone what my GoPro "sees" whether pointed at me for a selfie or away from me. While the whole GoPro experience has been a real learning challenge, putting this product was pleasantly simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Wish the company included instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Wish the company included instructions on how to assemble. Had to look for a Youtube video for assistance and that wasn't much help. I'll hold my final judgment until I get back from a vacation trip to see if it's usable.
customer_reviews.author: @denalstevens

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Everything was accounted for, which is great. It's very sturdy material and so quick to put together! I love it. I'm not certain of its stabilizing features yet, I'll need to take it out soon and test it out. But otherwise, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Frye

customer_reviews.title: Really great addition to my setup
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely thought out and designed. Well built and works as expected. Nice soft grip and convenient tripod connection makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: T2i Owner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service & Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived quickly but there was a piece missing, in less then 24 hours after contacting Eco-Fused about the error they had resolved the issue and my part was on its way! As far as the product goes, i teach a videography course in a afterschool program and this mount is sturdy and holds up well! I will definitely be buying from Eco-Fused again!
customer_reviews.author: Servantvideo

customer_reviews.title: I have an extended battery on my GoPro so the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an extended battery on my GoPro so the screen is blocked. I use my phone as both the screen/viewfinder and remote. Having this mount has made it way more easier to have both camera and phone on one setup. Tried it out during a recent snow trip- worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. The grip fits perfectly in my hand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The grip fits perfectly in my hand. It is easy to attach, provides two attachments for both camera and external lighting. I have used it for several hours with no hand fatigue. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to put together. Love the fact that you can attach 2 cameras at the same time and use them in different directions. Using my S7 Edge to manage my GoPro is so useful! Product well sealed and packaged. Easy to use. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Koubikian

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely worth its price
customer_reviews.text: I Really like this product. I film for my Youtube channel using this and it is better than using my tripod. It has a very nice grip and everything is simple, yet high quality. It also has extensions to a few things.
customer_reviews.author: Bellastons

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the most useful items purchased in 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever tried to film video with 2 devices with 2 hands?? This should have been an option to come with the GoPro as mine was a gift to someone who was accustomed to using a hand held video camera. Until I found this, the GoPro was an expensive paperweight. Probably one of the most useful items purchased in 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: P- Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: mainly because it did as described and has the nice adjusting items
customer_reviews.text: I rate this as a 5, mainly because it did as described and has the nice adjusting items. I will say I was a bit worried about the smartphone holder, but I have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: A must! Was able to use this for my GoPro, in addition to a quick release plate (mounted in the middle) and a hand held grip on the bottom. Great for point of void or hand held recordings!! This piece made my trip to Mexico hassle free with my GoPro! Looking forward to more products such as these!
customer_reviews.author: Osiva

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with instructions so I had to figure it out (didn’t take long though, lol) but it would have been nice to have receive them. The pouch was poor quality, broke the same day it arrived. I bought it to go with my GoPro Tripod selfie stick and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Empresz

customer_reviews.title: Well built product that didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but very well built. I purchased another kit to get extra parts for different configurations with different camera combinations. I would highly recommend this grip for the novice AND the professional.
customer_reviews.author: Willee

customer_reviews.title: Not great for use with iphone or bigger
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to figure out how to assemble [which I know is partially user error] Didn’t love how it worked to be honest. Wouldn’t probably recommend if you have an iphone plus/ max or equivilant size.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Love this! So glad I got it for my GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little addition to my GoPro supplies! Very solid-made and great for anyone, like me, who does not have a digital back for their GoPro. Just wish there was a mounting hole on the end of the handle for attaching to a longer pole. That would make this perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dual mount!!
customer_reviews.text: The material is perfect, looks strong, it's tight when you place them in the whatever pod are you using, It really holds everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: FABO MORENO

customer_reviews.title: Go from good to great.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. i had to make a small modification so that I could ad a light to it. One thing that would be great would be to be able to extend the length of the grip. Either a telescoping grip or put a 1/4x20 thread into the bottom of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a fairly stable device. I was not able to use it simultaneously with my phone and the go pro. It seems to require a smaller go pro case, in order to use it comfortably with the phone. Will update, after further use.
customer_reviews.author: Rahquieh Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed by the quality and or design of this item. Such a disappointment. It got sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Ray O

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable grip if you're looking to stabilize your shots on a GoPro. It's small nature makes it travel friendly and the added strap provides a safeguard to dropping. I'm using mine with the new GoPro 6 (accessories not included) and it provides crisp footage without producing a jarring effect.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael R.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after light use
customer_reviews.text: bought it in June 2017 for work use (filming real estate walk thrus)Nothing rough or rugged today as i tried to put the camera in the pivot point that attaches to the handle shattered into several parts. didn't last long for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to be able to use your phone as the view finder.
customer_reviews.author: skybandit814

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing for the price. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a basic grip for their GoPro. I took it to Cancun with me last month and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Houston

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a school lip dub video and the footage didn’t turn out as smooth as I wanted it to. It works fine, I’m just nit picky.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Needs!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive grip because my arm gets tired when I hold my phone up for extended periods of time, and I'm a little accident-prone: I often forget I am holding things and then drop them. Yeah. The grip is super comfortable and you can re-orient the device either vertically or horizontally, depending on what you need. I highly recommend this hand grip if you need a little help holding things. p.s. No, I haven't dropped it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bernat Apprille

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and so versatile
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and so versatile! It's an AMAZING tool to use combined with your tripod, selfie stick, 3-way for GoPros, etc. I super recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Its so handy!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the coolest and most versatile items purchased so far. But the right tools and add it all together and it can create quite the camera mount. Very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Blue

customer_reviews.title: Looking for the Shorty? Buy this instead!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the shorty in my opinion. Inexpensive, very sturdy, quickly change different angles, and very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not recommended for prolong use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but not recommended for prolong use. Palm will become sore due to the bike handle bar grip, they should have use a smooth rubber grip instead.
customer_reviews.author: alfonso arboleda

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy This Device
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this. It does not do what it advertises hardly at all. Does not stabilize your device well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Really comes in handy and is way better than me holding the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chanzzzzz

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective, and the build quality is great. I don't use it for selfies on my phone...only for my GoPro Hero5 Black. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Scoutdriver

customer_reviews.title: the dual mount is great. the screws are a little difficult to put ...
customer_reviews.text: the dual mount is great. the screws are a little difficult to put in put they enter. what i didnt like was the phone mount, i have to take out the phone from its cover for it to enter in the mount.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Zaragoza Cardenales

customer_reviews.title: Will be very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I like the set up and can't wait to have a time to use it, being not a time for much out side stuff right now this spring and summer I hope to use it often and can see that it will be very useful.
customer_reviews.author: jeepsailor

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing all the time. It is awesome, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jameel Brooks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: NEED BETTER DESCRIPTION. THOUGHT IT CAME WITH A STAND AND 2 GRIPS
customer_reviews.author: Careen Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this handle to capture ccideo of my family while on vacation. It worked as intended but the mount had a crack hat eventually caused a break in the mount. I immediately contacted customer support. They asked me to submit some photos of the damage. I did so and they had a replacement to me within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: GoPro ready
customer_reviews.text: Overall does the job keeping your gopro steady in your hand. Perfect size for taking video or photos.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative for my go pro stick
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Its a good addition for go pro accesories. Good and sturdy built. Just dont tighten it too much.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Great Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Works well and you won’t go wrong buying one of these accessories for your GoPro. Price is reasonable and GoPro is secure on the device.
customer_reviews.author: Boone Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item while on vacation in Hilton Head island (SC). Thanks to Amazon Prime the item was delivered in 2 days. It is the perfect part for the job of holding my GoPro camera
customer_reviews.author: William J. Mol

customer_reviews.title: Simple Crazy and Functional
customer_reviews.text: It works for holding your phone while taking videos in a sporting event. Very simple and functional.
customer_reviews.author: VLF

customer_reviews.title: Great product, simple & the cost is right!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We have used this several ways, as pictured & we mounted it to a gimbal, this allowed us to view the shot & carry the gimbal in one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Health Conscious

customer_reviews.title: Good item, hopefully would use it in the future
customer_reviews.text: I bought this do a project but i never got to use. It looks like it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ayarza

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Just what I needed. A hand stabilizer to hold my GoPro and phone at the same time. By the way works with a little iPhone 4 or a bigger iPhone 7.
customer_reviews.author: El Vato Loco

customer_reviews.title: Work great for my iphone and Gopro
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my iphone and Gopro. No issues with the angle. Now I can use my iPhone to view and control my Gopro
customer_reviews.author: blimpy203

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and sure comes in handy to help stabilize a shot! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Brabble

customer_reviews.title: Constructed of plastic which feels flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Made of plastic which feels flimsy. Plastic mount squeaks when adjusting camera position or even slightest touch to camera or phone buttons. On positive note, phone mount provides a strong/tight grip and allows quick loading/unloading via spring action clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer, very useful item.
customer_reviews.text: This item enables me to use my GoPro in several ways. It came as described and ahead of schedule. I'm very happy with this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J.

customer_reviews.title: A definite MUST for GoPro owners!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what I needed for taking stills. Also useful for those who are vlogging. Requires a steady hand.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great GoPro grip
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our trip to Rome and we loved this grip. I enjoyed the option of switching from GoPro to my iPhone too. The wrist strap added an extra level of security in heavy tourist areas.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my GoPro 7 and iPhone X.. sometimes at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom EH

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: The hand grip was just what I was looking for. The Iphone 6s+ fit in the mount and the the GoPro attached as shown. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MomMom

customer_reviews.title: very very nice setup for viewing what you are recording!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice package for those who want to view their cam action on their cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Zakk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great handle! It really helped me take steady videos out in the woods without too much shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. I bought this to use with an action camera and I think it is a great accessory.
customer_reviews.author: SHV

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one bought one for me and loved it so bought one for my father in law. Good quality material came with everything it said it would. Every where I take it everyone loves it n wants to know where I got it
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very great stabilizing hand grip for action cameras. Highly recommended check out my video review: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Victor Caraveo

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son is happy with his purchase and will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: DISNEY WORLD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hand grip because I was going on a family trip to Disney World and I wanted to capture every minute, even the rides! I'm glad I can go on high speed rides and not have to worry about my camera falling off. I love this product! 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: ... yet but is exactly what I wanted and came super quick! Very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but is exactly what I wanted and came super quick! Very happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mackinzie Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! Made my life so much easier. i vlog daily & this is a god send.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to put together, and the gripping is pretty nice. I like the fact that is has a dual action for your phone and camera as well. The only I wish the camera could do is extend a little more. The quality of the videos also does come out a little shaky but it's still overall good.
customer_reviews.author: syd

customer_reviews.title: nice grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple addition to camera. Makes pictures, videos more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Works well and pretty quality
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I tried it once when I interviewed someone. The video I took looks clear and stable .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi useful
customer_reviews.text: Great design and very useful! I love that you can use it for both GoPro and phone, or use them separately!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You need to be careful, the grip gets lose from time to time on its own...
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia

customer_reviews.title: A good, sturdy handle that I can use that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. A good, sturdy handle that I can use that is comfortable. Don't mistake this for a cheap gimble though. Only thing I dislike is that the clamp for your phone seems kind of cheaply made and its difficult to stretch outward for the size of my Galaxy S5 if I ever wanna use it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a great price you can't ask for any more
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Freytes

customer_reviews.title: The grip is excellent and has held up well in the rain
customer_reviews.text: For it's price, it does what it was intended to do. The grip is excellent and has held up well in the rain. I purchased this product for the purpose of using my go pro and phone at the same time. It have not had any issues with such a low cost product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven salas

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the most important part of the package
customer_reviews.text: Came without the hand grip piece. Hole in the packaging but not in the shipping package.
customer_reviews.author: nhfl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is really good, work perfect to hold both items a same time...
customer_reviews.author: regner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful grip. Comfortable to grip. Easy to use, easy to install. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool must buy.
customer_reviews.text: First it's too small to use as pictured. The phone will not be above the camera. It is short so the phone will only be a Centimeter above the camera and useless for checking to see if you are in frame. That being said I love this little adapter. I use it to put my Rode VideoMic Pro behind the camera. The large mic only sticks out an inch from the lens. It makes a compact setup that I can carry anywhere and get great audio to pair with the superb video we all love from gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Get back to nature

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely with my go-Pro hero 3+ good affordable hand grip!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! The first one I ordered broken and so did the second within days!
customer_reviews.author: NC Mommy!

customer_reviews.title: Simple and good
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple option that feels good in your hand and is better than just holding your phone. I got everything that's shown.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Good Grip. Video is stable at 4k. Happy so far1
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome simple and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome simple and very handy. If you want to record with your phone with a steady hand this is great for the price

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: There is no stabilizing. It is just a grip that will hold both phone and GoPro.

customer_reviews.title: Product seems great for average user
customer_reviews.text: Product seems great for average user, sturdy enough. Retailer was great when item came with missing part and replaced it fast and easy.

customer_reviews.title: but overall a good product,
customer_reviews.text: Not what I wanted, but overall a good product, thanks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Built great and can easily add my phone to the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CamKix Stabilizing Hand Grip Compatible with GoPro Hero 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3+, 3 and DJI Osmo Action w/Dual Mount, Tripod Adapter and Universal Phone Holder - Record Videos with 2 Different Camera Angles
product_meta.description:
Color:Hand GripCamKix Hand Grip, Dual Mount, Tripod Adapter and Universal Phone Holder 

This kit can be used in various ways. Check the product pictures for a few examples or continue reading. 

The Dual Mount can be used to record video with 2 different camera angles simultaneously. Ideal for action sports videos, music/sports fan reportages, interviews, instruction videos, travel videos, etc. 

If your GoPro Hero camera does not have an LCD screen to monitor what you are recording, why not use your iPhone or Android phone? Just download the GoPro app and use it as a Live Viewfinder and to control your GoPro Hero 4. 

The hand grip not only offers you a firm grip to keep your GoPro camera or phone camera steady, it also works as a compact selfie stick that you can use to aim the camera at yourself or a group of people including yourself. 

Need even more functionality? CamKix offers a wide selection of GoPro mounts and accessories that you can mix to create your own solution. Need a wider angle? Try the CamKix Premium Telescopic Pole. Need a compact and steady base? Try the CamKix Premium Tripod. The possibilities are endless! 

Contents: 

- 1x Hand grip 

- 1x Dual mount 

- 1x Tripod adapter 

- 1x Universal phone holder 

- 1x Large thumbscrew 

- 2x Small thumbscrew 

- 1x Cleaning cloth 

CamKix If for any reason you are unhappy with any product by CamKix, please do not hesitate to contact us. We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our very best to solve your problem quickly and efficiently!
This product and/or service is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way associated with GoPro Inc. or its products and services. GoPro, HERO, and their respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of GoPro, Inc.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE PHOTO & VIDEO KIT: The Hand Grip, Dual Mount, Tripod Adapter and Universal Phone Holder can be used in various ways. Check the product pictures for a few examples or continue reading.

2 CAMERA ANGLES AT ONCE: The Dual Mount can be used to record video with 2 different camera angles simultaneously. Ideal for action sports videos, music/sports fan reportages, interviews, instruction videos, travel videos, etc.

MONITOR AND CONTROL YOUR GOPRO WITH YOUR PHONE: If your GoPro Hero 4 camera does not have an LCD screen to monitor what you are recording, why not use your iPhone or Android phone? Just download the GoPro app and use it as a Live Viewfinder and to control your GoPro Hero 4.

GREAT FOR STEADY SHOTS AND SELFIES: The hand grip not only offers you a firm grip to keep your GoPro camera or phone camera steady, it also works as a compact selfie stick that you can use to aim the camera at yourself or a group of people including yourself.

NEED EVEN MORE FUNCTIONALITY? CamKix offers a wide selection of GoPro mounts and accessories that you can mix to create your own solution. Need a wider angle? Try the CamKix Premium Telescopic Pole. Need a compact and steady base? Try the CamKix Premium Tripod. The possibilities are endless!
